TextLibrary.Text: Your mind is strong. I sensed your thoughts high above me.
Your mind is strong. I sensed your thoughts high above me.
Will you help us? We need to find the Soulless.
Will you help us? We need to find the Soulless.
I will. You were correct. These creatures are powerful, they have hidden themselves, even from me.
I will. You were correct. These creatures are powerful, they have hidden themselves, even from me.
Bring me a crystal from the place you call Nornes III. Such crystals have certain properties that may prove useful.
Bring me a crystal from the place you call Nornes III. Such crystals have certain properties that may prove useful.
